name: carbonfootprintfrompublictransit
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool carbonfootprint.
Tool description: Calculate the carbon footprint in various situations, such as travel and hydro usage.
API description: Calculates the CO2 emissions in kilograms from the use of public transportation based on the distance traveled and type of transit.

type.description: The type of transportation, one of: 'Taxi', 'ClassicBus', 'EcoBus', 'Coach', 'NationalTrain', 'LightRail', 'Subway', 'FerryOnFoot', 'FerryInCar'.
